# jos-lab

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jos-lab
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jos-lab
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jos-lab
jos-lab <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jos-lab
jos-lab <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
